entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
